entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.3°C
entry.summary:

Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: -0.6°C
Wind: N 28 km/h gust 37 km/h

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to a few flurries this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Periods of snow inland and over higher terrain early this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along exposed areas of the coast. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 07 March 2023
